title: How long does it take to write a 1,000 page book? - Quora

response.answer_text: The duration depends upon the tendency of an individual besides maintaining a writing schedule of writing 500-1000 words every day. That's all it takes to complete a book. If you are ready with your manuscript you may contact us for further proceedings. You’ll be glad you did this… Happy Publishing!
Normally, it may about a month if you also consider finalizing the book. But it also depends on what you're writing, when you're writing, how you're writing and how much you're writing everyday !
